verbs.description: [V: pick] [ARG1: of the week timing next rain chance and possible snow mix clear skies light winds and dry air] are allowing temperatures to bottom out this thursday morning another frosty start underway as a freeze warning is in effect until 9 a m bright sunshine and light winds all day should help to boost our temperatures into the upper 50s marking the warmest of the week so far enjoy west lafayette south bend indy garth brooks
